meanings.definition: Suggested as being good or suitable for a particular purpose or situation.
meanings.sent1: The teacher recommended this book for our class project.
meanings.sent2: It is recommended to wear a helmet while riding a bike.
meanings.sent3: The recommended movie was so funny, I couldn't stop laughing!
meanings.sent4: The recommended route to the top of the mountain was challenging but rewarding.
meanings.sent5: The doctor's recommended treatment helped me feel better quickly.

meanings.definition: Advised or suggested as worth doing or using.
meanings.sent1: The recommended restaurant in town serves delicious food.
meanings.sent2: It is recommended to check the weather before planning a picnic.
meanings.sent3: The recommended way to study for the test was to use flashcards.
meanings.sent4: Following the recommended steps led to a successful outcome.
meanings.sent5: The recommended brand of shoes lasted longer than expected.
